description:
In this course, you will learn how to cook easy Japanese chicken recipes. There are 23 recipes included in this course which are simple and the ingredients required are basic. There are so many ways to cook chicken and in this course you will learn how to properly cook it. 

You will learn a variety of ways to cook chicken in this course such as deep-frying, stir-frying, stewing, simmering, searing, boiling, and using chicken in pasta, soup, and salad. Some of the Japanese all-time favorite recipes that you will learn to cook in this course are chicken teriyaki, tomato curry stew, chicken soba salad, mizoreni and jibuni.

There are 23 sections in this course for each recipe. Each section is composed of three lectures which includes

  • complete list of ingredients and possible substitutes
  • estimated cooking time and calorie count
  • detailed step by step cooking instructions with images and a fun timelapse cooking video
  • downloadable PDF file for each recipe

Most of the recipes taught in this course can be cooked in less than 30 minutes. Following each recipe will help you save time - you no longer have to think what to cook for dinner everyday, just follow the recipes presented in this course.

Have fun in the kitchen!
title: Learn to Cook Easy Chicken Dishes - Japanese Food Recipes
